column4: Ubuntu always has a blank black screen whenever I "Log out". If I move the mouse it doesn't do anything, I have to force shutdown and restart. It's pretty annoying, anyone know why it does that? I don't ever log off anymore, I just shutdown. But I want to fix this problem!
does it behave like this on every reinstall attempt?
dont overthink it. you say it working now. let it be
but the console doesn't come up and i really want to figure out why.
